message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.IR, cs.LG 

The paper discusses the development of a system that observes user interactions with an application to build a stochastic dynamic model of the application and how it is used. This involves analyzing and adapting the application interface, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Additionally, the use of application and user models to determine user preferences and goals involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the labor-intensive process of building and maintaining such models, which relates to software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the use of information gain to evaluate possible state splits involves machine learning (cs.LG).
